Name: bedroom
story: You're in bed, it is cold but you want go on a adventure
nav: press 1 to outside, press 2 to in your closet, press 3 to go in your bed

Name: outside
story: You decide to go outisde for you adventure. You walk down the street when is magical train is simply parked around the corner
nav: Press 1 to get on the train, press 2 to go back home

Name: closet
story: You decide to go in your closet to create your little adventure. However, to your surprise there's a door, once you open in you fall down on the grass… you've been teleported
nav: press 1 to follow the weird footprints, press 2 to run the oppsite way into the forest

Name: cosy bed
story: You decide to make your adventure in your head, as you slowly start to fall asleep, peter pan kidnaps you and takes you to his island. He looks scared
nav: press 1 to run inside the nearest cave, press 2 to stay in peter pans home

Name: hut
story: You see footptints and you decide to follow them all the way to a grey hut, there's a nice garden near the hut as well
nav: press 1 to another closet, press 2 to look at the garden

Name: forest
story: You are scared so you panic. You run away to your death
nav: press 1 to die or press 2 to die

Name: train
story: You keep arrive on the train, you can keep exploring or you can sit in the dusty cart  and wait
nav: press 1 to sit a the first cart , press 2 to keep exploring

Name: cave
story: You ran away, but not for long, peter pan is everywhere, its time for you to go to sleep for ever
nav: press 1  to explore?

Name: peters house
story: It's nice and warm, you decide it isnt so bad here, you decide to help Peter with one task
nav: press 1 to look at the moutain, press 2 to go on the pirate ship

Name: closet 2
story: You decide to hide in the closet and hope it will bring you home…. Sadly you waited too longer and hunger has gotten to you
nav: press 1 and try to go home

Name: garden
story: You decide to collec ingredients to make a snack but then you see a portal…. What is more important
nav: press 1 to access the kitchen, press 2 to jump in a portal

Name: engine room
story: You love exploring the train, you decide to go deeper up the train, but you realise it might be better to so anything and go back.
nav: press 1 to go to the conductors cart , press 2 to go back and sit at the first cart

Name: first cart
story: You are too scared too move, you wait until the train stops moving to get off and walk back home
nav: press 1 to wait until the nightmare is over

Name: kitchen
story: You realize your forgot some ingredients so you want to go back to the garden, or you can just give up and go through the not totally weird portal
nav: press 1 to go back to the garden , press 2 to go to the magic portal

Name: portal
story: You decided on the magic portal, it will take you home one way or another…. Youll be confused either way
nav: press 1 to leave, press 2 to wake up

Name: conductor suit
story: You've explored all the way to the conductors cart. You can take the round trip while being at the best spot or you rather go back to the dusty cart where you feel like scared
nav: press 1 to take a trip around the continent , press 2 to go back to first cart

Name: mountain
story: You decided to take a stroll with Peter all the way up the moutain, you heard his story. Due to you not running away he lets you leave on a sailors ship or you can stay…. Forever
nav: press 1 to leave t, press 2 to get on the sailors ship

Name: pirate ship
story: You decided to fight… to the death?? Well you can either die… or escape on this magic cloud above the ship and go home
nav: press 1 to fight to the death, press 2 to escape on a cloud

Name: cloud
story: You decide to go one the cloud to escape the nightmare of neverland, you need to go home or else the cloud will evaporate
nav: press 1 to fly around until you leave, press 2 to stop flying and make the cloud go bye bye

Name: around the world
story: you take the trip all the way back home, you can't describe what you saw due to the train going to fast, or maybe you'll just grab a coffee to warm you up
nav: press 1 to go back home , press 2 to grab a coffee at tim's

Name: Tim
story: You grab your coffee and realise its wait to late so you deicde you might want to go home… or you can go on the round trip again?
nav: press 1 to go home, press 2 to take the trip around the continent

Name: sailor ship
story: You sail back home, or you panic and sink deicde to sink…. Bye bye
nav: press 1 to sail home , press 2 to let the ship sink

Name: couch
story: You wake up confuse and deicde its time go to back to bed
nav: press 1 to think you insane and go back to sleep

Name: bedroom
story: Everything was a fragment of you imagination
